name: Jelly Chocolate Mania
description:
Jelly Chocolate Mania is a free new match 3 game, casual and adventure game. Enter the adventure land through wondrous jelly and Chocolate places.
Features:
*. Sweet Jelly Graphics.
*. Sweetest Game play in the Kingdom of Jelly.
*. Magical Booster to help completing the challenging levels.
*. Easy and Fun to Play.
